title: specified in Part 1 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Derelict Sites Act 1990
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Derelict Sites Act 1990 

(Urban Areas) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations and the Derelict Sites Regulations, 1990 to 2022 

may be cited together as the Derelict Sites Regulations, 1990 to 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited derelict site act 1990 (urban areas) regulation 2023 (2) regulation derelict site regulation 1990 2022 may cited together derelict site regulation 1990 2023

title: specified in Part 1 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the
heading: In these Regulations “Act of 1990” means the Derelict Sites Act 1990
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Act of 1990” means the Derelict Sites Act 1990 

(No. 14 of 1990).
text_norm: 2 regulation act 1990 mean derelict site act 1990 (no 14 1990)

title: specified in Part 1 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the
heading: 3. (1) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Cork
text_raw:
3. (1) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Cork 
specified in Part 1 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(2) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Galway 
specified in Part 2 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(3) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Kerry 
specified in Part 3 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(4) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Kilkenny 
specified in Part 4 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(5) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Limerick 
specified in Part 5 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(6) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Louth 
specified in Part 6 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(7) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Mayo 
specified in Part 7 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(8) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Roscommon 
specified in Part 8 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 (9) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Waterford 
specified in Part 9 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990 

[676] 3 

 
 
 4 [676]
text_norm: 3 (1) area situated administrative county cork specified part 1 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (2) area situated administrative county galway specified part 2 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (3) area situated administrative county kerry specified part 3 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (4) area situated administrative county kilkenny specified part 4 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (5) area situated administrative county limerick specified part 5 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (6) area situated administrative county louth specified part 6 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (7) area situated administrative county mayo specified part 7 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (8) area situated administrative county roscommon specified part 8 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 22nd december 2023 (9) area situated administrative county waterford specified part 9 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 676 3 4 676

title: specified in Part 1 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations prescribe areas in the cities/counties of County Cork, 
County Galway, County Kerry, County Kilkenny, County Limerick, County 
Louth, County Mayo, County Roscommon and County Waterford indicated to 
be urban areas for the purposes of the Derelict Sites Act, 1990. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 12 [676] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS, 
BÓTHAR BHAILE UÍ BHEOLÁIN, 
CILL MHAIGHNEANN, 
BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 8, 
D08 XAO6 

Teil: 046 942 3100 
r-phost: publications@opw.ie 
—————— 

DUBLIN 
PUBLISHED BY THE STATIONERY OFFICE 
To be purchased from

MOUNTSHANNON ROAD, 
KILMAINHAM, DUBLIN 8, 
D08 XAO6 

Tel: 046 942 3100 
E-mail: publications@opw.ie
